title: CR-091 VR Evidence Remediation — Interactive Authoring

comment:
PRE-REVIEW: CR-091-ADD-001 v0.1 — COMPLIANT. Recommend proceeding to pre-approval.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "CR-091 VR Evidence Remediation — Interactive Authoring" — present, non-empty.
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" — acceptable for v0.1 of self-authorizing executable document per SOP-002 Section 8.

STRUCTURE: All 8 required sections present per TEMPLATE-ADD (Addendum Identification, Description of Omission, Impact Assessment, Correction Plan, Execution, Scope Handoff, Execution Summary, References).

PARENT STATE: CR-091 confirmed CLOSED at v2.0 — satisfies SOP-004 Section 9B.4.

CONTENT REVIEW:
- Section 2 clearly describes the omission: CR-091-VR-001 was authored as freehand markdown rather than through the interaction engine, producing assertional rather than observational evidence per SOP-004 Section 9C.5.
- Section 3 correctly scopes impact to the evidence artifact only; implementation and qualification are sound.
- Section 4 defines 4 EIs aligned with SOP-004 Section 5 (pre/post-execution baseline commits). EI-2 appropriately flagged with VR=Yes for behavioral verification.
- Section 5 EI table matches 6-column template format. Execution-time placeholders ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail]) are correct for pre-approval stage.
- Section 6 (Scope Handoff) follows SOP-004 Section 9B.5 three-item structure.
- Section 8 references all relevant governing documents including specific SOP-004 sections.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found. Square-bracket placeholders are execution-time editable fields per template convention.
FORMATTING: Consistent throughout. Section numbering sequential and correct.
TYPOS/ERRORS: None found.
